title: Oh Hello there,
description: My name is Tim. I'm an self-taught Web developer based in Hayward, California.
imageCaption: And this is what I look like.

body.raw:
# Experience

I started learning Web and mobile development in 2017, and created 2 web and 2 android apps. I enjoy making fun and smooth app with modern tools like Next.js and Tailwind Css, Jetpack Compose.

Currently, I've been working on personal projects to improve my skills. Outside of Web and Android, I'm a passionate runner, husband, and dad.

# Connect

Anyway, that's enough about me.

I'm looking for my first Web developer role and ready break into the tech industry. If you think I might be a good fit for your organization, shoot me an email at timtb.dev@gmail.com and let's chat.
